entry.title: Friday night: A few clouds. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 34 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 40 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 40%
